job.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
job.description: pOur CONFIDENTIAL growth clientnbspis looking for experienced DevOps and Site Reliability Engineers who are interested in working with a fastgrowing team in building industryleading real estate data services You will be working on a small team using cutting edge technology and tools to build and support infrastructure for our diverse environment including customer facing applications large scale data processing and APIsppbrppTechnologiespulliGoogle Cloud Compute Storage NetworkingliliKubernetesliliHelmliliTerraformliliCircleCIliliMonitoring DataDog or Stackdriver StatusCakeliliLinuxliliBashliliPythonliulpbrppApplicationData StackpulliAirflowliliHasuraliliETL processesliliDatabase Development and support Postgres BigQuery MongoDBliliGraphQLliliLookerliliNodejsliliReactReduxliliPythonliulpbrppIf you can articulate the value of CICD and Infrastructureascode IAC and have handson coding experience with infrastructure management automation in the cloud GCP OR AWS would look forward to reviewing your background ppbrppstrongOnce you apply well send you the full job spec all company information and a highlight of their leadership teamstrongp
